keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only a Conservative Government will respect the result of the referendum and deliver on our deal to take Britain out of the EU.
We plan to provide an extra 20,000 more police officers, with the powers they need to keep our streets safe so people can live without fear of crime.
Unemployment is down to a record low rate while the number of people in work has never been higher. We have also cut income tax for 32 million people.

issues.brexitEurope: Only a Conservative Government will respect the result of the referendum and deliver on our deal to take Britain out of the EU.
